clean_data: Database Administrator span lDatabasespan span lAdministratorspan Database Administrator Montana Department of Labor and Industry Helena MT Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Database Administrator Montana Department of Labor and Industry Helena MT March 2014 to Present As Database Administrator for the Montana Department of Labor I review evaluate design implement and maintain databases These databases incorporate or are connected to Tableaurelated data warehouses and servers Microsoft Dynamics ServiceNow SharePoint PowerBI Oracle ERP and a host of other systems Recent projects include completion of an inter divisional data warehouse accompanying SSIS structure and moving selfhosted systems into Azure I also identify data sources construct data decomposition diagrams provide data flow diagrams and document the processes I write code for database access modification and construction In addition I am an experienced Technical Writer and Analyst and have at times been a Web designer My Web work can still be seen at the states travel site Ive authored a couple of books inside and outside the technical arena Database Administrator Logistic Systems Inc September 2006 to March 2014 Database design coding testing and supporting for multiple server and network environments Proficient in several database systems including Oracle DB2 Access MS SQL Server JDBC Visio Apache Java Visual Studio XML Windows and Unixbased systems complete list on request Skills include performance tuning and capacity monitoring data conversion systems integration security backup and recovery HADR design and administration forms and reports development web solutions SQL optimization Technical Writer Logistic Systems Inc June 2002 to March 2014 Use of a wide range of tools in creating documentation geared toward both technical and nontechnical audiences Wrote programmerlevel API documents for using the API with JavaJSP web services W3C SOAP protocol Windows NET Apache Axis and XML Wrote installation and configuration guides Researched program installation and database problems Wrote and edited extensive technical copy Target media included print and online documentation Web Designer Montana Dept of Commerce January 1996 to June 1997 Contract work creating content for the states Lewis Clark bicentennial website Education
